parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and encourages voting for the candidates of the Partidul Social Democrat (PSD) for both the Senate and the Chamber of Deputies. This directly refers to specific parliamentary candidates and fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this conclusion. It addresses the wide population and fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support the PSD candidates.  Phrases like "Vă îndemn să ieșiți la vot și să susțineți candidații Partidului Social Democrat" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior. This fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and instead promotes a specific political party.  The call to action directly contradicts journalistic principles of neutrality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of a political party and its candidates. The language used is persuasive and promotional, not reflective of a personal viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2259221664463522</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific parliamentary candidates (PSD), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PSD. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PSD Candidates (Senate and Chamber of Deputies)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Gireada Dumitru-Verginel, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 2259221664463522, care îndeamnă la vot pentru candidații Partidului Social Democrat la Senat și Camera Deputaților,  constituind propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Textul „Vă îndemn să ieșiți la vot și să susțineți candidații Partidului Social Democrat pentru Senat și Camera Deputaților” are un efect electoral clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea PSD. Prezența numărului CMF 11240017 confirmă natura politică a reclamei.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
